sentences: Wolfgang Gert Stresemann (20 July 1904 â€“ 6 November 1998) was a German jurist, orchestra leader, conductor and composer.
He was the intendant of the Berliner Philharmoniker from 1959 to 1978 and again from mid 1984 to early 1985, a time when Herbert von Karajan served as music director.
From 1939 to 1956, Stresemann lived in the United States with his mother.
Stresemann's daughter Christina (born 1957) is a judge at the Federal Court of Justice of Germany.
